SCRIPT.MSCRI:
echo off :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 100 :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_CVS.PRV.INCLUDE.UPDATE_LOGGING_PARAMS
! Trim parameters :SET &UC4RB_CVS_URI# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CVS_URI#) :SET &UC4RB_CVS_WORKING_DIRECTORY# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CVS_WORKING_DIRECTORY#) :SET &UC4RB_CVS_REVISION# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CVS_REVISION#)
! Normalize Working Copy Path :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_CVS_WORKING_DIRECTORY"
! Ensure Working Copy Path exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_CVS_WORKING_DIRECTORY# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_DIR_EXISTS
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!Updates a given working copy :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_CVS.PRV.JOBI.LOGIN@WINDOWS :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS cd /d "&UC4RB_CVS_WORKING_DIRECTORY#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:IF &UC4RB_CVS_REVISION# = "" : IF &UC4RB_CVS_OVERWRITE# = "YES" cvs -d &UC4RB_CVS_URI# update -d -r HEAD -C : ELSE cvs -d &UC4RB_CVS_URI# update -d -r HEAD : ENDIF :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_CVS_OVERWRITE# = "YES" cvs -d &UC4RB_CVS_URI# update -d -r &UC4RB_CVS_REVISION# -C : ELSE cvs -d &UC4RB_CVS_URI# update -d -r &UC4RB_CVS_REVISION# : ENDIF :ENDIF :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_CVS.PRV.JOBI.LOGOUT@WINDOWS
